scripts.test: if [[ -z "${MOZ_AUTOMATION}" ]]; then npm run test-esr; npm run test-master; fi
scripts.test-esr: if [[ -z "${MOZ_AUTOMATION}" ]]; then python3 scripts/tests/e2e-tests.py esr102; fi
scripts.test-master: if [[ -z "${MOZ_AUTOMATION}" ]]; then python3 scripts/tests/e2e-tests.py gecko; fi
scripts.build: npm run build-html-changelog; cp scripts/manifest.json extension/manifest.json; cp extension/settings/prod.js extension/settings.js; npm run update-localization; web-ext build -s extension --overwrite-dest  --no-config-discovery -n firefox_translations.xpi
scripts.build-test: cp extension/settings/test.js extension/settings.js; npm run update-localization; web-ext build -s extension --overwrite-dest  --no-config-discovery -n firefox_translations.xpi
scripts.android: cp scripts/manifest-dev-android.json extension/manifest.json; cp extension/settings/dev.js extension/settings.js; npm run update-localization; web-ext run -t firefox-android --firefox-apk org.mozilla.fenix -s extension --verbose --no-config-discovery --pref=extensions.experiments.enabled=true
scripts.android-win: copy scripts\manifest-dev-android.json extension\manifest.json & copy extension\settings\dev.js extension\settings.js & npm run update-localization-win & web-ext run -t firefox-android --firefox-apk org.mozilla.fenix -s extension --verbose --no-config-discovery --pref=extensions.experiments.enabled=true
scripts.desktop: cp scripts/manifest.json extension/manifest.json; cp extension/settings/dev.js extension/settings.js; npm run update-localization; web-ext run -s extension --verbose --firefox nightly  --no-config-discovery --pref=extensions.experiments.enabled=true
scripts.package: npm run build && mv web-ext-artifacts/*.zip addon.xpi
scripts.update-localization: git submodule init && git submodule update --remote --depth 1 extension/_locales; npm run clean-localization-folder
scripts.update-localization-win: git submodule init & git submodule update --remote --depth 1 extension\_locales & npm run clean-localization-folder-win
